item.title: Looking at Chinese parent-teenager conflict talks from the perspective of the rapport management theory
item.description: As a common but complex linguistic phenomenon, conflict talks (CTs) frequently occur in daily communications. This study aims to carry out analyses of parent-teenager CTs in two Chinese TV series A Love for Separation and Home with Kids to reveal the three steps of CTs. item.description: In many cultures in the world, discipline is a very important quality of students in schools.
